sources.description:
Falcon Rising : A hero emerges from the ashes
Suffering from PTSD, ex-Marine John "Falcon" Chapman (Michael Jai White) has nothing left to lose‚Äîuntil his activist sister Cindy (Laila Ali) is brutally attacked in Rio‚Äôs favelas. Now, he‚Äôs tearing through Brazil‚Äôs underworld to unmask a trafficking ring run by the yakuza. Bullets fly, bones break, and justice arrives with a vengeance.
